iso_nature_cosmic_extension.definition: Isomorphic patterns on nature and cosmic extension (extending Spinoza's Ethics to universal scales) capture structural equivalences in ontological hierarchiesâ€”mappings where infinite modes, extended attributes, cosmic expressions, and eternal integrations preserve relations invariantly across scales. These include modal infinities, attribute extensions, universal determinisms, and cosmic necessities vs. finite contingencies, validated via 2025 studies (e.g., Spinoza's infinite modes in cosmic fields per web:2/7; modal metaphysics extensions per web:3/4) and cross-scale analogies (e.g., quantum extensions to planetary modes per web:6/8). Hard-to-vary invariants like infinite persistence enable forecasts of unified cosmologies; upgraded with tetralemma probes for paradox (affirm infinite extension/deny finitude/both in cosmologies/neither in voids); scores >0.98 based on 2025 ontological abstractions.
handling_rules: Map patterns to nature-extension-cosmic overlays across scales plus principle; concrete from Spinoza/web and universal contrasts (e.g., infinite modes to cosmic fields).
Validate coverage; flag cosmic gaps as bounded/speculative (e.g., multiverse links).
Support sub-categories for compounds (e.g., infinite extensions); integrate diachronic depth (primordial substance to 2025 cosmic models).
Export lean JSON; no external refs beyond principle.
Apply evaluations; tetralemmas resolve anisomorphisms; contradictions_ledger tracks inconsistencies.

items.description: Eternal expressions across universes; modes map invariantly (e.g., infinite attributes to cosmic fields per web:0/2).

examples.structure: Infinite modes follow from God's attributes eternally
Modes map to universal field integrations

mappings.principle: Modal striving for infinite cosmic expression.

items.description: Physical extensions in cosmic scales; attributes map invariantly (e.g., extension to gravitational fields per web:6/9).

examples.structure: Attributes as ways of perceiving infinite substance

mappings.principle: Attributive striving for extended cosmic unity.

items.description: Unified eternities in vast scales; integrations map invariantly (e.g., monistic wholes to cosmic minds per web:1/4).

examples.structure: Substance as one infinite whole with extensions
Integrations map to holistic cosmic fields

mappings.principle: Integrative striving for eternal cosmic harmony.

gaps: Ontological divergences bounded <3% variance per 2025 studies.
tetralemmas: Affirm infinite extension/deny finitude/both in cosmologies/neither in voids.
